bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.util

Class CSVExport

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.util.CSVExport

  • public class CSVExport
extends Object
    This class is responsible for saving Table data in an OutputStream using the standard CSV format. See http://www.wotsit.org/ for details on CSV.
    Since:
    2006
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

    • Method Detail

      • isBasicType

        protected boolean isBasicType(Object obj)
        Figures out if parameter obj is a basic Java type.
        Returns:
        true if obj is either a Number, a String, a Character or a Boolean.

        Returns:

      • escapeString

      • export

        public void export(OutputStream os,
          TableModel data,
          ListSelectionModel selection)
            throws Exception
        Export data.
        Parameters:
        os - the OutputStream where to save data
        data - the data to save
        selection - the rows that only have to be saved. If null, all the rows in data are saved.
        Throws:
        Exception - this exception is thrown if something wrong occured during save process.
